title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for October 2024
description: The puzzle answers throughout October 2024. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for October 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here's the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for tonight's game in October 2024. We've also got answers for the other puzzles today.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout October 2024. We will also reveal the solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout tonight’s show, but we’ll highlight the final puzzle first. We’ll also share the word for the Fan Fridays sweepstakes, since this contest is still active. This month, Ryan Seacrest will continue as host for regular WoF programming while Pat Sajak will be returning as Celebrity Wheel of Fortune host when it premieres on October 14. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles in the month of October 2024. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, October 11, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – CASUAL ACTIVEWEAR (What Are You Wearing?) Tossup #1 – MAID OF HONOR (Person) Tossup #2 – GIRLS TRIP (Movie Title) Regular Puzzle #1 – RUBIES, DIAMONDS, EMERALDS (Things) Regular Puzzle #2 – MOISTURIZING & SOUR CREAM (Showbiz Name) Regular Puzzle #3 – GETTING MY STEPS IN (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #3 – FROZEN BROCCOLI (Food & Drink) Tossup #4 – FROZEN PEAS (Food & Drink) Tossup #5 – MR. RIGHT NOW (Person) Regular Puzzle #4 – BUY MORE, SAVE MORE (Phrase) Fan Friday – GETAWAY Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, October 10, 2024: Bonus Round Puzzle – IT WORKS WITHOUT FAIL (Phrase) Tossup #1 – BIRDS OF A FEATHER (Phrase) Tossup #2 – REAL ESTATE BROKER (Occupation) Regular Puzzle #1 – CHOCOLATE-COVERED STRAWBERRIES (Food & Drink) Regular Puzzle #2 – YOU HAD ME AT HELLO KITTY (Before & After) Regular Puzzle #3 – SPENDING THE WHOLE DAY AT THE SPA (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #3 – MR. RIGHT (Person) Tossup #4 – MR. WRONG (Person) Tossup #5 – MR. RIGHT NOW (Person) Regular Puzzle #4 – PHOTO SHOOT (Event) As a reminder, the Fan Friday sweepstakes is still taking place. We’ll post the word you need to enter for the contest here when the Friday, October 11 episode airs later this week. The word for the October 11 episode is GETAWAY.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout October 2024. We will also reveal the solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout tonight’s show, but we’ll highlight the final puzzle first. We’ll also share the word for the Fan Fridays sweepstakes, since this contest is still active. This month, Ryan Seacrest will continue as host for regular WoF programming while Pat Sajak will be returning as Celebrity Wheel of Fortune host when it premieres on October 14. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles in the month of October 2024.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, October 11, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – CASUAL ACTIVEWEAR (What Are You Wearing?)
  • Tossup #1 – MAID OF HONOR (Person)
  • Tossup #2 – GIRLS TRIP (Movie Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – RUBIES, DIAMONDS, EMERALDS (Things)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – MOISTURIZING & SOUR CREAM (Showbiz Name)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – GETTING MY STEPS IN (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #3 – FROZEN BROCCOLI (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #4 – FROZEN PEAS (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #5 – MR. RIGHT NOW (Person)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – BUY MORE, SAVE MORE (Phrase)
  • Fan Friday – GETAWAY

Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, October 10, 2024:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – IT WORKS WITHOUT FAIL (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – BIRDS OF A FEATHER (Phrase)
  • Tossup #2 – REAL ESTATE BROKER (Occupation)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CHOCOLATE-COVERED STRAWBERRIES (Food & Drink)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – YOU HAD ME AT HELLO KITTY (Before & After)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SPENDING THE WHOLE DAY AT THE SPA (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #3 – MR. RIGHT (Person)
  • Tossup #4 – MR. WRONG (Person)
  • Tossup #5 – MR. RIGHT NOW (Person)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – PHOTO SHOOT (Event)

As a reminder, the Fan Friday sweepstakes is still taking place. We’ll post the word you need to enter for the contest here when the Friday, October 11 episode airs later this week. The word for the October 11 episode is GETAWAY.
